cast.name: 伊丽莎白·拉雷纳 Elisabeth Larena
洪·科塔哈雷纳 Jon Kortajarena

introduction: John is a man in his late thirties who still lives with his mother. Locked in his room, he devotes his time to create stories around a fictional character, Juanito, his alter ego. The fear of the world beyond his door crashes with his innate curiosity, but during his whole life fear and home comfort have always won the battle. John's safe and controlled world will be challenged when Juanito escapes from his drawings and sneaks into his room with the purpose of killing him.
